table.title: USB3.2 Gen1x1 Type-A Redriver Topology Notes

entry.p: Max/min routing length for USB3.2 Gen1 speed (5 Gbps) depends on repeater performance and its loss compensation capability when used in conjunction with Intel CPU. Work with repeater vendor to ensure the selected part can provide adequate signal integrity at the CPU.
Please consult with the redriver vendor to determine the appropriate ESD recommendation.

table.title: USB3.2 Gen1x1 Type-A Redriver Topology Mainstream, Premium Mid Loss (PML), Rx,Tx Routing Guidelines
